Package edu.baylor.ecs.sw1.canvas

Class DatabaseConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.baylor.ecs.sw1.canvas.DatabaseConnector
  • public class DatabaseConnector
extends java.lang.Object
    DESIGN PATTERN FACADE The mongoDB database connector. Acts as a facade between the db and the java application. This facade hides the MongoDB queries from the java application, handling the conversion of internal events to mongoDB queries cleanly.
    Author:
    strafford
